sqlMap.select: SELECT TRUNC(T.COMPLETE_DATE, 'dd') as aday, (CASE T.ACCESS_TYPE_ID || T.GAME_ID WHEN '020001' THEN '一球成名' WHEN '020002' THEN '隋唐名将' WHEN '020003' THEN '魔道六宗' WHEN '020004' THEN '三国杀' WHEN '020005' THEN '梦回神国' WHEN '020006' THEN '梦幻飞仙' WHEN '020007' THEN '将军' WHEN '020008' THEN '热血篮球' WHEN '020009' THEN '热血海贼王' WHEN '020010' THEN '三国风云2' WHEN '020011' THEN '欧冠足球' END) as gameid, SUM(T.ECMONEY / 100) as adaymoney FROM BILLY_ORDER_HISTORY T, BILLY_ORDER_STATE_HISTORY T1 WHERE T.ORDER_TYPE = 'pay' AND T.ID = T1.ORDER_ID AND T1.STATE = 'new' AND T.COMPLETE_DATE > TO_DATE(#fromDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND T.COMPLETE_DATE < TO_DATE(#toDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND T.ACCESS_TYPE_ID || T.GAME_ID IN ('020001', '020002', '020003', '020004', '020005', '020006', '020007', '020008', '020009', '020010', '020011') GROUP BY TRUNC(T.COMPLETE_DATE, 'dd'), (CASE T.ACCESS_TYPE_ID || T.GAME_ID WHEN '020001' THEN '一球成名' WHEN '020002' THEN '隋唐名将' WHEN '020003' THEN '魔道六宗' WHEN '020004' THEN '三国杀' WHEN '020005' THEN '梦回神国' WHEN '020006' THEN '梦幻飞仙' WHEN '020007' THEN '将军' WHEN '020008' THEN '热血篮球' WHEN '020009' THEN '热血海贼王' WHEN '020010' THEN '三国风云2' WHEN '020011' THEN '欧冠足球' END) ORDER BY 2,1

SELECT TRUNC(T.COMPLETE_DATE, 'dd') as aday, (CASE PAYMENT_MODE_ID WHEN 'YB' THEN '易宝' WHEN 'AL' THEN '阿里' WHEN 'YBDX' THEN '易宝电信' WHEN 'JW' THEN '骏网' WHEN 'YBLT' THEN '易宝联通' WHEN 'YBSZX' THEN '易宝神州行' END) as qudaoid , SUM(T.ECMONEY / 100) as adaymoney FROM BILLY_ORDER_HISTORY T, BILLY_ORDER_STATE_HISTORY T1 WHERE T.ORDER_TYPE = 'buy' AND T.ID = T1.ORDER_ID AND T1.STATE = 'finished' AND T.COMPLETE_DATE > TO_DATE(#fromDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND T.COMPLETE_DATE < TO_DATE(#toDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND PAYMENT_MODE_ID IN ('YBSZX', 'YBLT', 'YBDX', 'AL', 'YB', 'JW') GROUP BY TRUNC(T.COMPLETE_DATE, 'dd'), (CASE PAYMENT_MODE_ID WHEN 'YB' THEN '易宝' WHEN 'AL' THEN '阿里' WHEN 'YBDX' THEN '易宝电信' WHEN 'JW' THEN '骏网' WHEN 'YBLT' THEN '易宝联通' WHEN 'YBSZX' THEN '易宝神州行' END) ORDER BY 2,1
